docs.title: Better Dicord Themes
docs.text: inspired by many other themes: userMacieG#7591(theme: Discord.tv), Xyhlo#9766(th: VSC Cord) and many more

docs.title: Aesthetic.th
docs.text:
Almost no changes to default UI, only colors via default vars

added plugins via import:

  • Settings Modal
  • Chat Bubbles
  • Radial Status
  • Float

Un/Comment as you wish.
